venue.name: Connecticut Post Cinema 14 Rave Motion Pictures

item.description:
Come see " Rise of the Planet of the Apes" at the Rave Motion Pictures Milford CT Post 14!

Some of us are doing dinner too, at 6, feel free to join.

If you're only a "Maybe", please put a comment in your RSVP.

Delaware Senate nominee Christine O'Donnell famously asked "if evolution is true, why aren't monkeys still evolving into humans?"  Well, here they are, come see the movie that proves evolution!

Don't forget, they air-condition these places heavily in the summer, you may want a light jacket.

DINNER? Some of us are doing dinner too, at 6 at Red Robin, feel free to join.  Red Robin is close to the cinema, but on level 2.

HOW TO FIND US: At 7:20 I'll be in front of the main concession stand. At 7:30 I'll go into the theater.  You can also text me.  If it helps, I'm tall (6'3").

HOST: Jason, cell # in my RSVP (texting is fine too)

PARKING: Free. The cinema is near the Target, on the SW end of the mall. On the 3rd floor. Park in front or back.
item.name: Wed 8/10 - "Rise of the Planet of the Apes" in Milford (dinner too)
